import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, Form} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import { listProductDetails, createProductReview } from '../actions/productActions' import { PRODUCT_CREATE_REVIEW_RESET } from '../constants/productConstants' import AnimatedPage from '../components/AnimatedPage' function ProductScreen({ match, history }) { const [qty, setQty] = useState(1) const [rating, setRating] = useState(0) const [comment, setComment] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const { loading, error, product} = productDetails const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin const productReviewCreate = useSelector(state => state.productReviewCreate) const { loading: loadingProductReview, error: errorProductReview, success: successProductReview} = productReviewCreate useEffect(() => { if(successProductReview){ setRating(0) setComment('') dispatch({type:PRODUCT_CREATE_REVIEW_RESET}) } dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) //request dei dettagli del prodotto PARTE SUBITO & SEMPRE }, [dispatch, match, successProductReview]) const addToCartHandler = () => { history.push(`/cart/${match.params.id}?qty=${qty}`) } const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(createProductReview( match.params.id, {rating, comment} )) } /* const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id) */ return (
Go Back {loading ? : error ? {error} : (

{product.name}

 price: ${product.price} description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status : {/* se Ã¨ maggiore di 0 "on stock" altrimenti "out of stock" */} {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty setQty(e.target.value)} > { [...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map((x) => ( //keys ritorna un array con le pk degli oggetti es. [0,1,2] ))//mappo una serie di tag options in cui Ã¨ un numero dell'array di countInStock generato con keys() } )}

Reviews

{product.reviews.length === 0 && No Reviews} {product.reviews.map((review) => ( {review.name}

{review.createdAt.substring(0,10)}

{review.comment}

 ))}

Write a Review

{loadingProductReview && } {successProductReview && Review Submitted} {errorProductReview && {errorProductReview}} {userInfo ? (
Rating setRating(e.target.value)}> Review setComment(e.target.value)}>
) : ( Please login to write a review )}
) }
) } export default ProductScreen
